SEARCH
Package Interface.consensus.synch

Interface SynchronousAlgorithm<V extends Number & Comparable<V>>

Type Parameters:
V - Type of the default value on timeout
All Known Implementing Classes:
AtomicApproximateDouble, AtomicApproximateDoubleTemplate, AtomicInexactDouble
public interface SynchronousAlgorithm<V extends Number & Comparable<V>>
Interface defining methods related to the synchronous model, as it affects approximate consensus algorithms. This means that it defined methods for the timeout and for default values that should be filled in, in the case that timeout is reached.
